titleStmt.title: The Arguments of the Lord-keeper, the two Lords Chief Justices, and Mr. Baron Powell, when they gave judgement for the Earl of Bath
titleStmt.author: Somers, John Somers, Baron, 1651-1716.
Treby, George, Sir, 1644?-1700.
Holt, John, Sir, 1642-1710.
Powell, John, Sir, 1645-1713.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 805:33 as Wing A3646 (number cancelled) and at reel 2240:13 as Wing (2nd ed.) S4637.
The two chief justices were George Treby and John Holt. Baron Somers was the Lord-Keeper.
Reproduction of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and British Library.
